name: Scanner Assault
description:
For this jam game, your mission is to eliminate any human you can see.

Controls

WASD - Move

LMB - Lock an enemy / Shoot a locked enemy

RMB - Unlock an enemy

Mouse - Move the camera around

After three seconds not taking any damage, the drone will start to regenerate its health.


Known bugs (mostly to avoid duplicate bug reports)

- Going from the pause menu to the level select menu can cause the sound sliders to be locked in the level select menu. They unlock themselves if you go back to a level.
- Navmesh is absent from level 2 and 3. Will upload fix to an external website  Fixed version is available here https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mEEScQv90u2Wne-FPsHAb1js7UOf_gkZ/view?usp=shari...

Credits

Tomo Ge - Code, Visuals, SFX, Music
